price: 28.Wonna hinnay usun addunyal duma Qellisak sugen umaanccna keenih tambulleeh, usun addunyah gacsiminnoonuy Yallaa kee kay farmoyta ken kak waasse koroosannuh gacak yenen, diggah usun dirableela kinnon.
arabic: بَلۡ بَدَا لَهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُخۡفُونَ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَوۡ رُدُّواْ لَعَادُواْ لِمَا نُهُواْ عَنۡهُ وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: bal badā lahum mā kānū yukh'fūna min qablu walaw ruddū laʿādū limā nuhū ʿanhu wa-innahum lakādhibūna
